# Formative Evaluation of the Supporting Blended Finance: the Global Network for Blended Finance Project
## Procurement Notice

### Project Overview
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a contractor to provide Formative Evaluation Services for the Supporting Blended Finance: the Global Network for Blended Finance project. A Contractor will be engaged for a period of five months to evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of the project.

### Solicitation Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01014234
- **Solicitation Number**: 23-227744
- **Publication Date**: November 22, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2023
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
- **Trade Agreements Applied**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Specifications and Requirements
The contract shall be awarded to a qualified Contractor who has expertise in providing Formative Evaluation Services, with experience in human resource services, business consulting, and project management.

### Important Dates
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined

### Contract Value
The total contract value is unknown, and bids are invited from qualified Contractors with the necessary expertise.

### Contact Information
No contact information is available.
 
### Download Link
Download the solicitation documents from [CanadaBuys Canada](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/fda6e2bc5e72b5d03d254384007955c3/23-227744_-_tsps_-_npp.pdf) for the English version and from [CanadaBuys Canada](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/4e86e745917fcbfdc08b4bb47751272c/23-227744_-_tsps_-_apm.pdf) for the French version.

**Trade Agreements**:
